name: Asahi Technologies
description:
Asahi Technologies has over 10 years of experience building several custom software solutions for business across the United States. We provide small, medium and enterprise-level enterprises with cutting edge solutions to help them achieve their business goals.
As part of our FREE initial strategy consulting service, we focus on identifying your pain points. We then create a detailed proposal outlining the scope of work, project timeline and total cost. Our goal is to provide you with the most suitable software solution for your business, while also ensuring that the timelines and costs are kept well within the budget that you originally communicate to us.
Over the years, through the hundreds of projects that our team has worked on, we’ve developed a highly refined software development process. We firmly adhere to the industry standard agile methodology when it comes to software development. However, we also believe in conducting an initial discovery process, espectially with new clients or new projects so that we can set expectations on project scope, timeline and budget early on.
Our team lives and breathes innovation and creativity. We have tremendous passion to find cutting edge and advanced ways to combine technologies, creating scalable custom software solutions for you. Our technology enthusiasts, design aficionados, experienced project managers, business analysts, software architects and engineers each play a critical role in your project. Our team of experts build problem solving software solutions for complex business requirements.
Our core services are:
Custom software development
Custom web application development
Dedicated development teams for client engagement
Reach out to us for cutting edge software solutions that are created with the latest and best in class technologies.
